title: ►NO FEE◄  STUNNING NEW RENOVATION 3 bed, 2 bath
posting_body: ['►NO FEE◄  Stunning new renovation.', ' Be the first to live in a beautifully renovated 3 bed 2 bath first floor apartment on Ashford St.  New bathrooms and kitchen with stainless appliances and quartz countertops.', ' New central AC/heating plus full size in-unit laundry.', 'Refinished wood floors.', 'Close to everything - shops, restaurants, bars and public transportation.', "It's a short distance away from BU West, Packard's Corner (Packard's Corner B-line T-stop, Super 88 Market, 24 hr.", 'Star Market), #57 bus (Oak Square, Kenmore, Watertown Yard), #66 bus (Harvard Sq) and Allston center.', 'No Smoking', 'Contractors are still busy working on the apartment with pictures coming soon.']
